author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

To verify whether the memory increase seen in #50106 is originated by the revert of the Geometry to some old one (that was already present in 150X_mcRun3_2025_realistic_v13, used as baseline for 160X_mcRun3_2026_realistic_v1)

#### PR validation:

Just intended to run the bot tests
title: [NOT TO BE MERGED} Test phase1_2026_realistic with 150X_mcRun3_2025_realistic_v13
